testcase.name: Successful user login
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Successful user login Given User on the login page ... passed in 2.239s When User enters 'standard' as username ... passed in 2.200s And User submit the login form ... passed in 1.118s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.161s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Unsuccessful user login with incorrect username
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Unsuccessful user login with incorrect username Given User on the login page ... passed in 5.649s When User enters 'wrongUser' as username ... passed in 2.196s And User submit the login form ... passed in 1.072s Then User should see an error message indicating incorrect/incomplete credentials ... passed in 0.065s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
